FILE: cm145160v11.0.txt
DYAD: BOLIVIA-ARGENTINA
RIVALRY: RIV341
DISPUTE(S): MID1600 
RIVALRY: RIV342
DISPUTE(S): MID2147 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170729
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

Pre-1900 MIDs: MID1600 

MID2147 

TERRMID: MID2147 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2147 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2147 3 -- uncertain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2147 from Gibler, Little, and Miller (2016: IIB-22), Bolivia and Paraguay were about to go to war over their territorial dispute, and Argentina was rumored to have told both countries that it would not allow war to happen. GLM recommend this MID be dropped because that statement does not constitute a threat and therefore does not constitute a MID. Coded third party link to territory because this was connected to the Bolivia-Paraguay territorial dispute, but coded uncertain because of GLM's recommendation this be dropped. 

MARITMID: MID2147 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2147 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2147 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2147 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2147 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2147 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2147 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

MID2147 in 1928 concerned Argentina's involvement in the Paraguayan and Bolivan dispute over the Chaco.
